setBaseURI(string,bool).details: Can be overriden by the specific token URI

setProductURI(uint256,string,bool).details: Emits an event so there's provenance

params.productId: Token Index that will be given an URI

setUniqueURI(uint256,string).details: Emits an event so there's provenance

params.tokenId: Token Index that will be given an URI

setUniqueURIBatch(uint256[],string[]).details: Uses the single function so it also emits an event

params.tokenIds: Token Indexes that will be given an URI

tokenURI(uint256).details: IF the specific token URI doesn't exist, the general base URI will be returned

setBaseURI(string,bool).notice: Sets the Base URI for ALL tokens

setProductURI(uint256,string,bool).notice: Gives an individual token an unique URI

setUniqueURI(uint256,string).notice: Gives an individual token an unique URI

setUniqueURIBatch(uint256[],string[]).notice: Updates the unique URI of a token, but in a single transaction

tokenToProductIndex(uint256).notice: Returns the token index inside the product

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Returns a token's URI, could be specific or general
